import{appConstants}from"../constants/constant";export var login=function login(user,success,failure){// we can use a library called qs   qs.stringify(user) to get a urlencoded form data
var userFormData=new FormData();userFormData.append('username',user.username);userFormData.append('password',user.password);// ES6 fetch API, async, await
var loginPromise=fetch('http://localhost:8089/login',{method:'POST',body:userFormData,credentials:'include'}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(res){res.success?// check success is a function
typeof success==='function'&&success():typeof failure==='function'&&failure();return res;}).catch(function(err){typeof failure==='function'&&failure(err);return err;});return{type:appConstants.LOGIN,payload:loginPromise};};
